title: When, and why do you ever say "bg" ?
body:
Just kind of surveying around seeing when people use the term "bg" at the end of a game rather than "gg"
BG = Bad Game
GG= Good Game

In my experiences, I have only used "bg" for the following,

-A Team had an unfair status [AFK Players / Trolls, Regardless if I won or lose the game.]
-I had a very toxic player / team [Regardless if I won or lose the game]
-The enemy team was very toxic toward me or my team [Resulting in a less enjoyable experience]
-Someone was blatently cheating [Scripts / Script Timers]
